comment: Wow! it's so nice and very useful app and easy to use

Easy to use and this is the best app

author: Jatin Gupta
comment: Superb

author: Aravind V. Nair
comment: Best app to identify unknown numbers. Love the camera scanning feature. A small feature request... Rather than backing up everything, it would be better to have an option for selecting what to backup. A lot of people already use Google Contacts for contacts. So, the only thing left to backup is call log, block list and SMS log. It would be nice if this feature is implemented. Also, it would be really nice to have backup over WiFi and an option to select what precise time the backup happens. It keeps using my mobile data always as the backup happens around 17:00 and I'm outside at that time.

reply.author: True Software Scandinavia AB
reply.content:
Hi Aravind,

Thank you for the love and feedback. We'll forward your request to the team. 

Thank you!

author: Mathew W
comment: It's pretty handy and catches some spam callers. The main issue I have with it. The caller ID doesn't work while the call is coming in. All it says is that I need 3G/LTE OR WIFI network to identify. The issue is when ever a call is coming in, the mobile network and not the data network is the only thing active. I don't use WIFI on my phone much and even if I did, it would only be at home. This app will however tell you who is calling after you ignore it. You can call back if it's not a spam caller.

author: Laura B
comment: Time saver! Warns me about spam calls then makes it very easy to block them instantly. Lost access to my contact list and I was surprised at how many friends were identified by Truecaller. No more answering calls I don't want in case it's something important. If I'm waiting for a call from any company, they are always identified.

author: Cletus Slesbusger
comment: Request #349295   That request number was emailed to you previously. I responded to the ticket email & sent to your address.  Licence tied to phone number. Number change disables licence. Their support is unresponsive. Their support system did send me a survey email, though. Damn shame they are so afraid of losing a penny they effectively stole my money.  Emailed them as instructed here on 20 Feb 2018. Nothing. No response. They ethyl have my $18. I still have nothing from them.

reply.author: True Software Scandinavia AB
reply.content:
Hi Cletus,

Sorry about that. We have more emails than usual and are trying to respond to everyone as fast as we can. 

I can help you if you share me the ticket# you received. Alternative is contacting me at "kamran.mamedi@truecaller.com"

Best,
Kamran

author: Jim Herron
comment: MMS doesn't function, and only sends messages individually, no groups.  Caller I'd comes up under other windows which makes it useless.  I bought the pro version, and am regretting it.  Could be a 5 star app with more work and friendlier user interface.  Maybe all they need to do is have a tutorial that helps people get some answers!

author: Jahnavi Chokshi
comment: Truecaller should show the name when I got the call from unknown number. Instead of that, true caller shows the name of unknown caller once I receive or decline the call. There is no meaning to show the callers only which are in my contact list even though my internet data is always on.

reply.author: True Software Scandinavia AB
reply.content:
Hi Jahnavi,

Can you please double check if battery optimisation is disabled for Truecaller within your phone settings / battery / battery optimisation.

It shall solve the problem

Read more here: “https://support.truecaller.com/hc/en-us/articles/212028169”

author: Advocate Somnath Bhattacharjee
comment: It never blocks spam numbers Automatically, though it claims to be. You have to block call individually. It never works on 4G cellular connection, always displays name after the call. It works good on WiFi. Now you can Backup your blacklist to google drive, that's a positive thing indeed.

I think the app is very useful and smart but my only complaint is the last seen doesn't get updated 6 out 10 days it doesn't seem to work for me and I wonder why. You always say the same thing that your servers r getting upgrade etc etc. and the worse part it works for some numbers I.e local numbers, numbers that are international or std I do not get the last seen. ge

reply.author: True Software Scandinavia AB
reply.content:
Hi,
We are currently moving around some servers which will have a delayed latency on services like Availability (last seen). It shall be working fine by now.

Sorry for the inconvenience

author: Bilkisu Munir
comment: I have been having difficulties to activate this app on my new device. It kept telling me I can not get verification code more than one in a day, while non verification code has been sent. Plz fix this app fr a better results

author: Steven Hagar
comment: I truly can't say it this app is any good because I made too many phone # confirmation requests in a 24 hour period, so they locked me out of using their app for 24 hrs. That is a first for a non banking app to lock me out for making mistakes with pass codes. As a side note my security app alerted me about the plethora of permissions this app requires. Seems that my security app thinks 26 + permissions is a bit excessive for a little app that is supposed to be harmless. Maybe I'll let this nosey little buggar keep its permission demands!

author: Yorsman Guatemala
comment: Updated. Too many notifications. Ads I can handle. Notifications, messages, annoying. I flashed a new OS and it won't send text messages. The system app works fine, but trucaller's in app sms does not. I've been looking for an alternative truecaller app but haven't had any luck... Yet...

reply.author: True Software Scandinavia AB
reply.content:
Hi Yorsman,

What can we improve with the SMS app? Is it not working as you cannot send SMS/MMS?

Best,
Truecaller

author: Abhisekh Subba
comment: I honestly love the app, but the amount of add being shown is too ridiculous.  I'm using my phone normally, browsing through Google or just my photos and almost every five minute, an ad comes up interrupting whatever I'm doing. Bitterly disappointed, seriously.

author: Luke Clark
comment: Wanted a simple quiet app that blocks unwanted calls. This it does however, it is constantly pushing notifications for me to activate the other features in the app which I don't want. There's no way to turn these irritating notifications off. If it keeps on like this I'll probably uninstall and try another one.

author: Dee
comment: I'm slightly, well no I'm more than slightly disappointed. I guess because I previously had a different phone where this app came pre-installed I didn't have to download it like I did with my new phone. The old phone however, with the app there I had the ability to record my conversations. Perhaps some might think that bad, but it depends on how you used it. Mine ended up saving my tail and proving that I was not a liar as I was being called. So I think I'm going to delete for now unless that record capability changes in the future. Thank you.

author: Sakshi Ajay
comment: Abnormal battery usage : Right now truecaller using an unusually large amount of battery power or causing  device run slowly.   Truecaller must have to work on performance and memory management.

author: Vinay Acharya
comment: Not a foolproof app but it's ok. The ratio of wrong n right identity is 50:50. I wish it cud locate d caller's tower at present. I presume it flashes names as stored in their friend's cell, not on whoz name it is registered. Spam identification is good.

author: Ajaya Bajracharya
comment: So this is a great app and does what it says. But,  "I was playing a landscape game. I got a call i ignored it and keep playing. The call turned into missed call and guess what happen? I was exited from game to show me the true caller notification and missed my wining points. Now i am not sure it is still a good app to be precise."

author: Brad Hill
comment: App requires me to open dial pad to push 1 for an unknown caller.  Sometimes, that delay causes call to go to voicemail and a call back.  I cannot find a way to make it easier to use.  I guess I did.... uninstalled.

author: VAIBHAV AGRAWAL
comment: kindly provide a setting which stop showing make true caller a default messaging app. I am happy with my default app but if i get this popup multiple times i might have to ask my friends to edit your app rating to lowest point so that you can disable it eventually. I love truecaller but still this new popup is irritating. I'll be thankful if you could help.

author: sameer wagh
comment: I install this app 2 week ageo. But true calling not showing 2 week before  . I do have my call log history of 1 year. But this app unable to identify.

author: Mrinal Mohan
comment: Ministry Of Home Affairs , Government Of India has released a circular regarding to avoid using some applications and Truecaller is one among those applications . It spies on it's Indian users and share their information and data with Chinese and  Pakistani infringement groups and terror organization .

author: June Greene
comment: Good... Does what it says it will do. The only problem I have found it does not have a separate message icon to let you know when a message comes in. I will give it 5 stars when they get a icon for the messages

author: Raghav Khajuria
comment: Dont poke me by trying to take control of my Callings.  Truecaller irritates me.  I just want truecaller to track unknown numbers for me. But it also tries me to make it my default calling app, overridding my phone's traditional way of calling.  I dont qat to use use app for making phone calls.

Unable to connect, try again later...even after restart and uninstall and reinstall. **update** everything is great now. App is awesome.  **UPDATE 26 FEB 2018*    I've kept this app and have grown comfortable with it. I've been able so somewhat identify a frequent secret caller who always hangs up (I know the name associated with the number now, but I'm sure it's a spoofed number and a fake name. When I dial back it's always an error that the call can't be placed as dialed even though I pressed callback, and the name is just a three word phrase with no spaces) I'd like a better answer but it's better than nothing). All around this app is excellent and I intend to keep it as long is it's available. Thank you guys so very much. I've already told people about you. If any app should come pre installed on your phone it's this one.

reply.author: True Software Scandinavia AB
reply.content:
Hi,

Our system was unfortunately down at certain stages during the weekend but everything is up and running smooth now.
We apologise for the inconvenience.

Have a nice day,
Truecaller team

author: Nasir Husen
comment: New contacts are getting created in phonebook with NO NAME display and this process didn't stopped for long time until I disabled true caller from application settings. I am not able to uninstall as well. Headset model Lenovo k4 note.

author: Laura Smith Dodson
comment: Know who's calling. Stop annoying calls and spammers. I stated this in 2016 and seems like its even better now.
